SELECT t.id id, t.contract_id contractId, t.acc_no accNo, t.contract_amt contractAmt, t.rep_code repCode, t.seq_no seqNo, t.mortgagee_acc_no mortgageeAccNo, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_parent mchnParent, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.result result, t.trade_type tradeType, t.status status, t.rep_msg repMsg, t.pay_amt payAmt, t.loan_platform loanPlatform FROM t_gq_fss_loan t where t.trade_type in ("11090001","11090002","11090010","11092001")
and t.contract_id like concat('%',#{contractId},'%')
and t.seq_no like concat('%',#{seqNo},'%')
and t.status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
and t.mchn_child like concat('%',#{mchnChild},'%')
AND 1=1
AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND SYSDATE()
AND t.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND #{modifyTime}
AND t.create_time < #{modifyTime}
